name: Meowrlin's Nine Lives
description:
You are Meowrlin, a legendary cat with nine lives and incredible powers. Your mission is to defeat your enemies, survive and get powerful upgrades as you navigate through the 9-minute levels. Will you be able to make it through all the levels and emerge victorious?

Credit:

Philosopher's Games at Game Developpement

Dylan Desban at Graphics : www.artstation.com/dylandesban

Nicolas Bouissy for the hedgehogs: https://www.artstation.com/nicolasbouissy

Veyle at in game Music
